info.description: RESTful API of Request Baskets service
info.title: Request Baskets API

get.description: Returns list of registered basket names

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Maximum number of basket names to return, default 20

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of basket names to skip, default 0

200.description: OK. Returns list of available baskets.

204.description: No Content. No baskets available for specified limits

get.description: Get current configuration of a basket

401.description: Unauthorized. Invalid or missing basket token

404.description: Not Found. No basket with such name

post.description: Allows to create a new basket with specified name

parameters.name: basket-name
parameters.description: The name of basket to create

201.description: Created. Indicates that basket is successfully created

403.description: Forbidden. Indicates that basket name conflicts with reserved paths; e.g. `baskets`, `web`, etc.

409.description: Conflict. Indicates that basket with such name already exists

204.description: No Content. Basket configuration is updated

401.description: Unauthorized. Invalid or missing basket token

404.description: Not Found. No basket with such name

delete.description: Delete basket and all collected requests

401.description: Unauthorized. Invalid or missing basket token

404.description: Not Found. No basket with such name

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Maximum number of requests to return, default 20

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of requests to skip, default 0

200.description: OK. Returns list of basket requests.

204.description: No Content. No requests found for specified limits

401.description: Unauthorized. Invalid or missing basket token

404.description: Not Found. No basket with such name

delete.description: Clear all requests collected by this basket so far

204.description: No Content. Basket requests are cleared

401.description: Unauthorized. Invalid or missing basket token

404.description: Not Found. No basket with such name

count.description: Total number of baskets in the system

has_more.description: Indicates if there are more baskets to fetch

forward_url.description: URL to forward all incoming requests of the basket, `empty` value disables forwarding

insecure_tls.description:
If set to `true` the sertificate verification will be disabled if forward URL indicates HTTPS scheme.
This allows to forward collected HTTP requests via HTTPS protocol even if the forward end-point is configured
with self-signed TLS/SSL certificate. **Warning:** enabling this feature has known security implications.

expand_path.description:
If set to `true` the forward URL path will be expanded if original HTTP request contains compound path.
For example, a basket with name `collector` is configured to forward all requests to URL
`http://my.internal.service/listener` and it has received an HTTP GET request like
`GET http://baskets.example.com/collector/company/12/users?action=find&name=John`.
Depending on `expand_path` settings the request will be forwarded as following:
`true` => `GET http://my.internal.service/listener/company/12/users?action=find&name=John`,
`false` => `GET http://my.internal.service/listener?action=find&name=John`

capacity.description: Baskets capacity, defines maximum number of requests to store

token.description: Secure token to manage the basket, generated by system

count.description: Current number of collected requests hold by basket

total_count.description: Total number of all requests passed through this basket

has_more.description: Indicates if there are more requests collected by basket to fetch

date.description: Date and time of request in Unix time ms. format (number of miliseconds elapsed since January 1, 1970 UTC)

headers.description: Map of request headers, key represents name, value is array of values
